name: Stockpile artist
description:
You have 60 seconds to store 12 crates in the warehouse.

You can throw the crates into 3 different zones, which are indicated by a green sign and a number.

  • Up and Down arrows change the throwing angle
  • Left and Right arrows change the force of the throw
  • Space triggers the throw

You score 1 point per crate in the Zone 1, 2 points for Zone 2, and 3 points for Zone 3.

I had a lot of ideas to upgrade this basic gameplay and for polish, but I had no time... That's the game :)

Known bugs:

  • Crates don't disappear when launching a new game. You have to restart the whole game for a clean new level.  (As it is not blocking, I will not replace the submitted version until the end of the ratings.)

Credits:

  • Coded with Godot 3.4 + Aseprite
  • Graphics from Kenney https://kenney.nl/assets/pixel-platformer, https://kenney.nl/assets/pixel-platformer-industrial-expansion
  • Sounds from https://freesound.org/
  • Font Origin-tech, from https://www.dafont.com/fr/origin-tech.font
